We have the name of one of Itou Kashitaro's women in Kyoto--Tsuji Masa,  
and I was sure Tama gave me the name of his favorite Tayuu (which I 
can't find) but I wonder if any our friends who can read Japanese have 
come across the name of the other mistress, the mother of his son.

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
